= Introduction =

=== Key ===

==== cif-client ====
 *  query cif
 * submit data to cif
 * get feeds from cif

==== cif-smart ====
 * parse data sets
 * run post processors on parsed data sets

==== cif-router ====
 * ?
 * ?

==== postgresql ====
 * data store

== One server ==

With one server every component is installed on the same host and must share resources (cpu and i/o) with the other components.
